ovdesc.p: This screen is used to store the non-working days for channels based on region of a country code.
A record authorised in this screen will create or amend or reverse a record in store table, PPT.CLEARINGNONWORKINGDAY
This table stores the exceptions. If a date is not a holiday, it will not be stored in this table.

desc.p: Record Activation Code generated for the record by the payment's hub.
The value is not editable by the user.
Indicates a Region,State etc. within a Country.
1) Non Mandatory field - Defaulted to "ALL" if left blank.
2) "ALL" if this applies for all Region within the mentioned Countrycode.
The above "ALL" setup is used to define a country level holiday.
3) Up to 35 Alphanumeric characters, which should represent Valid Region values as defined in the PPT.REGION table.
The Region entered should belong to the CountryCode entered.
Record Status Code generated for the record by the payments hub.
The value is not editable by the user.
Used for internal purpose. Value of this field determines values of fields, 'RAC' and 'RSC'
This field can hold upto 1 alphanumeric character and the value is not editable by the user.
Indicates a valid channel code for which holiday is being defined.

CEC – Centre for Exchange and Clearing
